attributes.action: Cuts enforced on Wirral Play Council an establishment for disable children of various disabilities.
attributes.additional_details:
Please stop the cuts on this as the 160 Disabled Children that go here need it. There is nothing locally much quite like it,and its time to change the thinking on their needs and must haves. It is there social environment and my severly autistic son of 7 years loves it!!
Please Stop the cuts and give more resources and give the children their sense of belonging in our alienated environment. Our Children need us to stand up for them and say stop enough is enough!! Some of them cannot talk recognisable words like my son so how must that affect him? ' I am his voice '!! these 160 children need this don't take it away.
